spell.name: Alustriel's Mooncloak
entries: For the duration, moonlight fills a 20-foot {@variantrule Emanation [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Emanation} originating from you with {@variantrule Dim Light|XPHB}. While in that area, you and your allies have {@variantrule Cover|XPHB|Half Cover} and {@variantrule Resistance|XPHB} to Cold, Lightning, and Radiant damage.
While the spell lasts, you can use one of the following options, ending the spell immediately:

items.name: Liberation
entries: When you fail a saving throw to avoid or end the {@condition Frightened|XPHB}, {@condition Grappled|XPHB}, or {@condition Restrained|XPHB} condition, you can take a {@variantrule Reaction|XPHB} to succeed on the save instead.

items.name: Respite
entries: As a {@action Magic|XPHB} action, you or an ally within the area regains {@variantrule Hit Points|XPHB} equal to {@dice 4d10} plus your spellcasting ability modifier.

spell.name: Backlash

time.condition: which you take in response to taking damage

entries: You ward yourself against destructive energy, reducing the damage taken by {@dice 4d6} plus your spellcasting ability modifier.

If the triggering damage was from a creature within range, you can force the creature to make a Constitution saving throw. The creature takes {@damage 4d6} Force damage on a failed save or half as much damage on a successful one.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: The damage reduction and Force damage from this spell both increase by {@scaledamage 4d6|4-9|1d6} for every spell slot level above 4.

spell.name: Blade of Disaster
entries: You create a 3-foot-long blade-shaped planar rift that lasts for the duration. The rift appears within range in a space of your choice, and you can immediately make up to two melee spell attacks, each one against a creature or object within 5 feet of the rift. On a hit, the target takes {@damage 10d6} Force damage. This attack scores a {@variantrule Critical Hit|XPHB} if the number on the {@dice d20} is 18 or higher.

As a {@variantrule Bonus Action|XPHB} on your later turns, you can move the rift up to 60 feet and repeat the two attacks against a creature or an object within 5 feet of it. You can direct the attacks at the same target or at different ones.
The blade can harmlessly pass through any barrier, including ones created by spells like {@spell Wall of Force|XPHB}.

spell.name: Cacophonic Shield
entries: Thunderous reverberations fill a 10-foot {@variantrule Emanation [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Emanation} originating from you for the duration. Whenever the {@variantrule Emanation [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Emanation} enters a creature's space and whenever a creature enters the {@variantrule Emanation [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Emanation} or ends its turn there, the creature makes a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the creature takes {@damage 3d6} Thunder damage and has the {@condition Deafened|XPHB} condition until the start of your next turn. On a successful save, the creature takes half as much damage only. A creature makes this save only once per turn. When you cast this spell, you can designate creatures to be unaffected by it.
In addition, you have {@variantrule Resistance|XPHB} to Thunder damage, and ranged attack rolls against you are made with {@variantrule Disadvantage|XPHB}.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: The damage increases by {@scaledamage 3d6|3-9|1d6} for each spell slot level above 3.

spell.name: Conjure Constructs
entries: You conjure a group of intangible, orderly spirits that appear as a Medium group of modrons or other Constructs in an unoccupied space you can see within range. The spirits last for the duration. When you cast this spell and as a {@action Magic|XPHB} action on subsequent turns, you can command the spirits to target one creature or object you can see within 5 feet of the spirits and create one of the following effects:

items.name: Clockwork Force
entries: The target makes a Dexterity saving throw, taking {@damage 3d6} Force damage on a failed save or half as much damage on a successful one.

items.name: Orderly Ward
entries: The target gains {@variantrule Temporary Hit Points|XPHB} equal to {@dice 1d6} plus your spellcasting ability modifier.
When you move on your turn, you can also move the spirits up to 30 feet to an unoccupied space you can see.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: The damage and {@variantrule Temporary Hit Points|XPHB} both increase by {@scaledamage 3d6|3-9|1d6} for each spell slot level above 3.

spell.name: Death Armor

m.text: an onyx worth 50+ GP, which the spell consumes

entries: For the duration, an inky aura surrounds one creature you touch. The target has {@variantrule Advantage|XPHB} on {@variantrule Death Saving Throw|XPHB|Death Saving Throws}, and once per turn, when a creature within 5 feet of the target hits it with a melee attack roll, the attacker takes {@damage 2d4} Necrotic damage.

spell.name: Deryan's Helpful Homunculi

m.text: powdered gemstones worth 100+ GP, which the spell consumes, and one set of Artisan's Tools with which you have proficiency

entries: You summon a group of helpful spirits, which lasts for the duration. The spirits appear as homunculi or as another Construct of your choice but are intangible and invulnerable, and they are considered to have proficiency in the {@skill Arcana|XPHB} skill and with the set or {@item Artisan's Tools|XPHB} used in the spell's casting.
If you are crafting an item, the spirits function as a single assistant for your crafting, halving the crafting time.

spell.name: Dirge
entries: Deathly power fills a 60-foot {@variantrule Emanation [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Emanation} originating from you for the duration.

When you cast this spell, you can designate creatures to be unaffected by it. Any other creature can't regain {@variantrule Hit Points|XPHB} while in the {@variantrule Emanation [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Emanation}. Whenever the {@variantrule Emanation [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Emanation} enters a creature's space and whenever a creature enters the {@variantrule Emanation [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Emanation} or ends its turn there, the creature makes a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the creature takes {@damage 3d10} Necrotic damage and has the {@condition Prone|XPHB} condition. On a successful save, the creature takes half as much damage and its {@variantrule Speed|XPHB} is halved. A creature makes this save only once per turn.

entries.name: Casting as a Circle Spell
entries: Casting this as a Circle spell requires a minimum of two secondary casters. If the spell is cast as a Circle spell, its duration becomes {@status Concentration|XPHB}, up to 10 minutes.

A creature that fails its save against the spell's effect also gains 1 {@condition Exhaustion|XPHB} level. While the creature has {@condition Exhaustion|XPHB} levels, finishing a {@variantrule Long Rest|XPHB} neither restores lost {@variantrule Hit Points|XPHB} nor reduces the creature's {@condition Exhaustion|XPHB} level.
When the spell is cast, each secondary caster must expend a level 4+ spell slot; otherwise, the spell fails.

spell.name: Doomtide
entries: You create a 20-foot-radius {@variantrule Sphere [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Sphere} of inky fog within range. The fog is magical {@variantrule Darkness|XPHB} and lasts for the duration or until a strong wind (such as the one created by the {@spell Gust of Wind|XPHB} spell) disperses it, ending the spell.

Each creature in the {@variantrule Sphere [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Sphere} when it appears makes a Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes {@damage 5d6} Psychic damage and subtracts {@dice 1d6} from its saving throws until the end of its next turn. On a successful save, a creature takes half as much damage only. A creature also makes this save when the {@variantrule Sphere [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Sphere} moves into its space, when it enters the {@variantrule Sphere [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Sphere}, or when it ends its turn inside the {@variantrule Sphere [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Sphere}. A creature makes this save only once per turn.
The {@variantrule Sphere [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Sphere} moves 10 feet away from you at the start of each of your turns.

entries.name: Casting as a Circle Spell
entries: Casting this as a Circle spell requires a minimum of five secondary casters. In addition to the spell's usual components, you must provide a special component (a string of three black pearls from Pandemonium), which the spell consumes. The spell's range increases to 1 mile, and its duration increases to until dispelled (no {@status Concentration|XPHB} required). The spell ends early if any caster who participated in this casting contributes to another casting of {@spell Doomtide|FRHoF} as a Circle spell.
When the spell is cast, each secondary caster must expend a level 3+ spell slot; otherwise, the spell fails.

spell.name: Elminster's Effulgent Spheres
entries: Six chromatic spheres orbit you for the duration.
While the spheres are present, you can expend spheres to create the following effects:

items.name: Absorb Energy
entries: When you take Acid, Cold, Fire, Lightning, or Thunder damage, you can take a {@variantrule Reaction|XPHB} to expend one sphere and give yourself {@variantrule Resistance|XPHB} to the triggering damage type until the start of your next turn.

items.name: Energy Blast
entries: As a {@variantrule Bonus Action|XPHB}, you send one sphere hurtling toward a target within 120 feet of yourself. Make a ranged spell attack. On a hit, the target takes {@damage 3d6} Acid, Cold, Fire, Lightning, or Thunder damage (your choice). Regardless of whether you hit, the sphere is expended.
The spell ends early if you have no more spheres remaining.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: The number of spheres increases by 1 for every spell slot level above 6.

spell.name: Elminster's Elusion
entries: Arcane wards protect you against magic for the duration. You have {@variantrule Advantage|XPHB} on saving throws against spells and magical effects. Additionally, if you succeed on a saving throw against a spell or magical effect and would normally take half as much damage, you instead take no damage.

spell.name: Holy Star of Mystra
entries: You create a glowing mote of energy that hovers above you for the duration. The mote sheds {@variantrule Bright Light|XPHB} in a 5-foot radius and {@variantrule Dim Light|XPHB} for an additional 5 feet.

When you cast this spell and as a {@variantrule Bonus Action|XPHB} on later turns, you can unleash a shining bolt from the mote, targeting one creature within 120 feet of yourself. Make a ranged spell attack. On a hit, the target takes Force or Radiant damage (your choice) equal to {@dice 4d10} plus your spellcasting ability modifier.

In addition, while the mote is present, you have {@variantrule Cover|XPHB|Three-Quarters Cover}, and if you succeed on a saving throw against a spell of level 7 or lower that targeted only you and didn't create an area of effect, you can take a {@variantrule Reaction|XPHB} to deflect that spell back at the spell's caster; the caster makes a saving throw against that spell using that caster's own spell save DC.

spell.name: Laeral's Silver Lance
entries: Silver energy bursts out from you in a 120-foot-long, 5-foot-wide {@variantrule Line [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Line}. Each creature of your choice in the {@variantrule Line [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Line} makes a Strength saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes {@damage 3d10} Force damage and has the {@condition Prone|XPHB} condition. On a successful save, a creature takes half as much damage only.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: The damage increases by {@scaledamage 3d10|3-9|1d10} for every spell slot level above 3.

spell.name: Simbul's Synostodweomer
entries: You imbue one creature you touch with magical healing energy for the duration. Whenever the target casts a spell using a spell slot, the target can immediately roll a number of unexpended {@variantrule Hit Point Dice|XPHB} equal to the spell slot's level and regain {@variantrule Hit Points|XPHB} equal to the roll's total plus your spellcasting ability modifier; those dice are then expended.

spell.name: Songal's Elemental Suffusion
entries: You imbue yourself with the elemental power of genies. You gain the following benefits until the spell ends:

items.name: Elemental Immunity
entries: When you cast this spell, choose one of the following damage types: Acid, Cold, Fire, Lightning, or Thunder. You have {@variantrule Resistance|XPHB} to the chosen damage type.

items.name: Elemental Pulse
entries: When you cast this spell and at the start of each of your subsequent turns, you release a burst of elemental energy in a 15-foot {@variantrule Emanation [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Emanation} originating from yourself. Each creature of your choice in that area makes a Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes {@damage 2d6} Acid, Cold, Fire, Lightning, or Thunder damage (your choice) and has the {@condition Prone|XPHB} condition. On a successful save, a creature takes half as much damage only.

items.name: Flight
entries: You gain a {@variantrule Fly Speed|XPHB} of 30 feet and can hover.

entries.name: Casting as a Circle Spell
entries: If the spell is cast as a Circle spell, its casting time increases to 1 minute, and its duration increases to {@status Concentration|XPHB}, up to 10 minutes. For each secondary caster who participates in the casting, you can choose one additional creature, to a maximum of nine additional creatures. The chosen creatures also gain the benefits of the spell for its duration.
When the spell is cast, each secondary caster must expend a level 2+ spell slot; otherwise, the spell fails.

spell.name: Spellfire Flare
entries: You unleash a blast of brilliant fire. Make a ranged spell attack against a target within range; a target gains no benefit from {@variantrule Cover|XPHB|Half Cover} or {@variantrule Cover|XPHB|Three-Quarters Cover} for this attack roll. On a hit, the target takes {@damage 2d10} Radiant damage.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: You create an additional blast for each spell slot level above 1. You can direct the blasts at the same target or at different ones. Make a separate attack roll for each blast.

spell.name: Spellfire Storm
entries: You conjure a pillar of spellfire in a 20-foot-radius, 20-foot-high {@variantrule Cylinder [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Cylinder} centered on a point within range. The area of the {@variantrule Cylinder [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Cylinder} is {@variantrule Bright Light|XPHB}, and each creature in it when it appears makes a Constitution saving throw, taking {@damage 4d10} Radiant damage on a failed save or half as much damage on a successful one. A creature also makes this save when it enters the spell's area for the first time on a turn or ends its turn there. A creature makes this save only once per turn.

In addition, whenever a creature in the {@variantrule Cylinder [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Cylinder} casts a spell, that creature makes a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the spell dissipates with no effect, and the action, {@variantrule Bonus Action|XPHB}, or {@variantrule Reaction|XPHB} used to cast it is wasted. If that spell was cast with a spell slot, the slot isn't expended.
When you cast this spell, you can designate creatures to be unaffected by it.

entries.name: Casting as a Circle Spell
entries: In addition to the spell's usual components, you must provide a special component (a blue star sapphire worth 25,000+ GP), which the spell consumes. The spell's range increases to 1 mile, and it no longer requires {@status Concentration|XPHB}. When the spell is cast, each secondary caster must expend a level 3+ spell slot; otherwise, the spell fails.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: The damage increases by {@scaledamage 4d10|4-9|1d10} for every spell slot level above 4.

The number of secondary casters determines the spell's area of effect and duration, as shown in the table below. The spell ends early if any caster who participated in this casting contributes to another casting of Spellfire Storm as a Circle spell.

spell.name: Sylun√©'s Viper
entries: A shimmering, spectral snake encircles your body for the duration. You gain 15 {@variantrule Temporary Hit Points|XPHB}; the spell ends early if you have no {@variantrule Temporary Hit Points|XPHB} left.
While the spell is active, you gain the following benefits:

items.name: Climbing
entries: You gain a {@variantrule Climb Speed|XPHB} equal to your {@variantrule Speed|XPHB}.

items.name: Venomous Bite
entries: As a {@action Magic|XPHB} action, you can make a ranged spell attack using the snake against one creature within 50 feet. On a hit, the target takes {@damage 1d6} Force damage and has the {@condition Poisoned|XPHB} condition until the start of your next turn. While {@condition Poisoned|XPHB}, the target has the {@condition Incapacitated|XPHB} condition.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: For each spell slot level above 3, the number of {@variantrule Temporary Hit Points|XPHB} you gain from this spell increases by 5, and the damage of Venomous Bite increases by {@scaledamage 1d6|3-9|1d6}.

spell.name: Wardaway
entries: You hurl a disorienting magical force toward one creature within range. The target makes a Constitution saving throw; Constructs and Undead automatically succeed on this save.

On a failed save, the target takes {@damage 2d4} Force damage, its {@variantrule Speed|XPHB} is halved until the start of your next turn, and on its next turn, it can take only an action or a {@variantrule Bonus Action|XPHB} (but not both). On a successful save, the target takes half as much damage only.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: The damage increases by {@scaledamage 2d4|1-9|2d4} for every spell slot level above 1.
